title: RiverCity Bike Rentals - A Fresh Start for a City Icon
summary: A fresh, vibrant landing page designed to get customers rolling.

story.text: The goal was to create a user-friendly experience that reflected the fun of driving. We focused on a clean layout and intuitive navigation, all delivered in our 3-Day website package.

title: Azure Estates
summary: A high-end, visually stunning showcase for luxury properties.

story.text: A high-end, visually stunning showcase for luxury properties. We build this realtor website with a focus on large, beautiful images and a seamless user experience. The site features a custom property listing system, allowing visitors to easily browse and filter properties based on their preferences. It includes a dashboard for the realtor to add or modify listings.

title: Vispea Studio - the other shirt store
summary: We built a full e-commerce shop powered on WordPress and WooCommerce.

story.headline: Life is better when you have no Fucks to give.
story.text: Style is knowing who you are, what you want to say, and not giving a damn. - Gore Vidal.

The display section on the homepage to see what's happening at a glance. Implemented a custom product filter to help customers find exactly what they want quickly. Added a custom checkout process to streamline purchases and reduce cart abandonment. it is powered on WordPress and WooCommerce, allowing for easy management of products, orders, and customer data.

title: Aura Apparel
summary: An elegant e-commerce experience for a bespoke fashion brand.

story.headline: Seamless Shopping
story.text: We designed and developed a custom Shopify theme focusing on large, beautiful product imagery and a frictionless checkout process to increase conversion rates.

title: MAZE Trockenbau
summary: A website for local dry wall and indoors installations company.

story.text: A clean website that showcases their services and projects, making it easy for potential clients to understand their offerings.

title: The Daily Grind
summary: A warm and inviting website for a beloved neighborhood coffee shop.

title: ConnectSphere
summary: A professional marketing site for a B2B communication platform.

story.headline: The Business of Connection
story.text: ConnectSphere needed to clearly articulate its value proposition to potential enterprise clients. We built a sharp, professional site that highlights features and benefits.

title: GreenShift Foundation
summary: An impactful website to drive donations for an environmental cause.

title: German Language Social Club
summary: Building a community hub with event calendars and member sign-ups.

story.headline: A Digital Stammtisch
story.text: The German Social Club needed a central online hub to post events, manage memberships, and welcome newcomers. We built a site that was both functional and welcoming.
An integrated, easy-to-update events calendar was a key feature, allowing members to see what's happening at a glance.

title: Elena Vance | Photographer
summary: A minimalist portfolio to let the photography speak for itself.

title: Serenity Flow
summary: A calming web application for class schedules and online bookings.

story.text: We designed a peaceful digital space that makes it easy for members to find classes, book their spot, and manage their membership.

title: Codify Academy
summary: An engaging and interactive platform for learning to code online.

story.headline: The Future of Learning
story.text: Our task was to build a Learning Management System (LMS) front-end that was both fun and educational, with interactive code editors and progress tracking.

title: PixelForge AI
summary: A dark, futuristic interface for an AI-powered art generation tool.

story.headline: Create Art with a Single Word
